availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Samuel Smedley (McCracken County, Kentucky plasterer. )

body.p: McCracken County, Kentucky plasterer. Kentucky native. Son of John L. Smedley and Mary Smedley. Married to Elizabeth Smedley. Father of Francis H. Smedley, Louella Smedley, Robert J. Smedley, and Mary E. Smedley. Resident in Paducah, Kentucky, in 1850. Plasterer in Paducah in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, McCracken County, Paducah No. 1, p. 146B-147A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, McCracken County, Paducah, 1st District, p. 954.
Find A Grave, "John Samuel Smedley (1816-1878)," Memorial #84373577, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/84373577 (accessed January 27, 2021).
